name: NationalDonateLifeMonthInformation
0:
”Alexa, ask national donate life month”
”Alexa, open national donate life month”
”Alexa, launch national donate life month”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: national donate life month
des: For the 2018 National Donate Life Month artwork, Donate Life America was inspired by the image of a rainbow and Maya Angelou’s quote, “Be a rainbow in someone else’s cloud.” Often following a storm, the presence of a rainbow provides optimism and motivates us to endure through dark times. Similarly, organ, eye and tissue donation is the bridge of comfort and hope between one family’s mourning and another’s healing — turning tragedy into renewed life.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
